a great video and photo instructions the only difference between those instructions and the pattern here is that this pattern includes purposeful holes which are needed to thread the bag s straps through 23 strap strap pattern the total length of your strap should be around 70 inches in step 2 slip_stitch the strap will stretch out so i recommend crocheting to a length of around 60 inches unstretched in step 1 error on the side of too-short because it s easy enough to add more row after step 2 if you want it longer step 1 thermal stitch chain 5 for 4 stitches of thermal stitch thermal stitch tutorial https //sambartley com/2024/02/10/thermal-crochet-stitch-tutorial/ continue the row repeat of thermal stitch until your strap is the desired length 55-65 inches step 2 slip_stitch fold the strap in half hot dog style and slip_stitch all down the length to secure it 24 at the end of this step your strap should be around 70 inches if it s too short you can add some thermal stitch into the end and repeat step 2 strap tube pattern this tube will hold your backpack straps at the bottom of the bag for this one we re making a simple rectangle with the moss stitch tutorial on the moss stitch https //hearthookhome com/how-to-crochet-the-moss-stitch/ the size that you want is approximately 4 inches a little smaller than your square block by 3 inches long enough to loop around your strap diameter for me to get my desired size 4 inches x 3 inches this was - medium / size 4 worsted yarn - 4 0 mm hook - moss stitch - chain 16 14 stitches - 9 row - total yardage 13 yds 25 strap tube attachment to square we ll be slip stitching the tube to a square 1 starting with a slip knot on your hook stick through both sides of the moss stitch rectangle folding the rectangle hotdog style and the edge of the square 26 2 yarn over and pull through 27 3 pull through the loop on your hook to complete a slip_stitch the working yarn stays on the back/wrong side of the square 4 continue slip stitching down the tube until you reach the other side of the square 5 fasten_off 28 29 inspiration inspiration for the bag s strap structure was taken from i heart gantsilyo s crochet no-sew
